General.Name: Hikari Tsushin Inc
General.Description: Hikari Tsushin, Inc., a holding company, engages in the sale of communication-related products in Japan. The company provides communication line services, water delivery, electricity, insurance, industry-specific IT solutions, payment solutions, mobile phones, and office automation products to individual and corporate customers. Hikari Tsushin, Inc. was incorporated in 1952 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: Hikari West Gate Building, Tokyo, Japan, 171-0021

3.Name: Mr. Koh  Gidoh
